node.name: 8 racks Foldable Wardrobe MAKE: CBEESO SPACESAVERS LLP MODEL: FD121
node.description: A clean and simple looking portable wardrobe to store clothes, shoes, books, toys, and more. Perfect for bedroom, comes with stronger & durable CR tubes, connectors and non-woven washable fabric. Lightweight product, easy to install and carry from one place to another without any tools or additional help. (SIZE: 1550x711x445mm / WEIGHT: 5 Kg / MATERIAL: Fabric & Composite plastic)
node.content: 1> A kind of Japanese concept of living, providing 8 racks storage system with easy to install technique /2> Skelton or structure is made with heavy-duty composite plastic that can hold the weight up to 35 Kg /3> Without tools it can be assembled within 10 minutes /4> Two side pockets are provided in cover for storing ready to use items /5> Cover is made with durable fabric and easy to wash with hand /6> Machine wash is prohibited and also fabric resist the stain of ink as well /7> Height is equivalent to 5 feet 6 inches, thereby upper compartments are easily accessible /8> Enough storage for required items by 2 babies /9> Recommended item for tenant and shifting is much easier with this lightweight storage.
node.alt: FOLDDON Foldable Wardrobe with 8 Racks Standard Size Beige and Brown

node.name: 8 Shelf foldable organizer MAKE: KESHAV INTERNATIONAL
node.description: Made up of high-quality polypropylene sheet and steel rod, it easily complements almost any existing dÃ©cor. Save space and keep all items in one shelving, ideal for any living room, bedroom, or small space, provides space to store toys, blankets, clothing, shoes and other items. (SIZE: 1400x750x370mm / WEIGHT: 5 Kg / MATERIAL: Steel + Plastic)
node.content: 1> 8 equally size cabinets of 350x350mm provide enough storage for king size blankets with weight carrying capacity up to 10 Kg /2> Each cube is made with alloy plastic sheet supported by steel frames & anti-bend connectors /3> As per the allotted area Cubes can be used separately, or be stacked and combined together to meet the needs /4> Panels are waterproof, dirt-resistant, and for few minutes fire resistant as well but it is requested do not place hot iron inside it until can be touch by bare hand /5> Do it yourself product, easy to assemble and disassemble by any teenager or mid adult /6> Two cabinets can be coupled into a single unit for storing long t-shirts or trousers and self-weight balancing against any sway.
node.alt: Keshav International Kids Wardrobe Cabinet 8 Door Storage Organizer Almirah Rack Shelf for Clothes Living Room Bedroom Green

node.name: 8 racks foldable closet MAKE: BDMP MODEL: 88130
node.description: With High quality steel tube & plastic connectors, this portable storage closet will meet long term storage needs. Innovatively crafted modern design, hanging rod & 8 storage shelves offers space for longer outfits as well as for folded clothes. Durable, portable, sophisticated and stylish design. (SIZE: 1750x1300x450mm / WEIGHT: 2 Kg / MATERIAL: Fabric & Steel)
node.content: 1> For those who love organized living under small space, this walk-in closet is essential wardrobe /2> Steel tubes provide the strength to carry the load up to 35 Kg under complete stability against sway /3> Corner joints are made with durable plastic and linen fabric for covering the wardrobe /4> Easy to wash with washing machine under slow run but for drying natural sunlight is suggested /5> 5 feet 10 inches height is easily accessible by adult /6> Steel members are powder-coated and carrying bag is also provided in case of relocating the entire setup /7> Steel almirahs are outdated concept these days and with these foldable wardrobes one can easily manage all his essential kinds of stuff.
node.alt: BDMP 62 Layer Fancy and Portable Foldable Collapsible ClosetCabinet Multi parpose Space Wardrobe 88130 Wine Red

node.name: 10 racks foldable wardrobe MAKE: CBEESO SPACESAVERS LLP MODEL: Sol_hal_0063
node.description: Assembled with a frame of metal pipes and high-quality plastic components, non-woven shelves made from 100 GSM fabric. Without the need of tools one can easy to assemble and disassemble the unit whenever want. Declutter home, organize shoes, clothes, books and more with 3-door foldable wardrobe. (SIZE: 1650x1360x450mm / WEIGHT: 6.12 Kg / MATERIAL: Steel + Plastic)
node.content: 1> Corrosion-free steel pipes and premium plastic joints ensure the stability and sturdiness of wardrobe /2> 10 racks to store essential household and personal items in a single place /3> 5 side pockets, closing zippers helps to cover the entire wardrobe when not in use /4> Assembling can be done without using any tool and easy to relocate /5> 5.5 feet high with one tallest compartment that can fit 20 unfold shirts and trousers /6> 10 non-woven black shelves made with 100 GSM fabric /7> Recommended product for bachelors to place all their essentials in single place.
